casebody.data:
Lea Lefebvre v. Albert E. Weiss et al. (5810)

Spallone, Stoughton and Norcott, Js.

Argued January 20 — decision released January 26, 1988 *748Albert E. Weiss, pro se, the appellant (named defendant). Nicholas G. Sarantopoulos, filed a brief for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

In this appeal, the named defendant is asking us to intervene into areas where the trial court properly exercised its lawful discretion and appropriately performed its factfinding function. This we will not do.

There is no error.
